resources.string: What are you expecting from GirlScript India Summit?
What all events have you attended earlier or organised (if any)?
Where do you see yourself in next 5 years?
Will you join us on these dates?

We are looking for volunteers for the most happening summit around the nation. Girlscript summit is a two day event consisting of various learning sessions alongside fun filled activities and so on.. The major aim behind this summit is to eradicate gender inequality and empower women. Some of the glimpse of the summit include:-

 1. Various technical session by the industry experts.

 2. Providing a platform to students to interact with the MNC's.

 3. Showcasing the work- environment of the MNC.

 4. Fun thrilled competition and many more.

 5.Calling the best performs of our Code for freedom campaign to share their motivational ideas and rewarding them.

 6.Calling successful programmers , women etc. To share their views and success stories.

 7.Collecting Resume/CV of college students to match them with an internship.

 8.Witnessing a live world record.
Attend the Girlscript\'s 1st India Summit 2K17 at Ahmedabad!
Become a Volunteer and contribute to India\'s 1st Women-oriented fest!
Be a part of World Record! Come and join with us! (Only for women)
